author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: You have just installed the 'redactor' cog. Have fun! This cog will attempt to auto-redact messages with sensitive information like a config.yml file. Add !noredact to have cog ignore and not redact.
name: redactor
short: This cog will attempt to auto-redact messages with sensitive information like a config.yml file. Add !noredact to have cog ignore and not redact.
